movies.title: Star Wars: A New Hope
movies.review: Luke Skywalker joins the Rebel Alliance to fight the Galactic Empire and rescue Princess Leia.

movies.title: Avengers: Endgame
movies.review: The surviving Avengers assemble once more to undo Thanos’s actions and restore order to the universe.

movies.title: Breaking Bad
movies.review: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with terminal cancer turns to making methamphetamine to secure his family’s future.

characters.name: Luke Skywalker
characters.description: A farm boy from Tatooine who discovers his destiny as a Jedi Knight.

characters.name: Tony Stark
characters.description: A genius billionaire philanthropist and inventor who becomes Iron Man.

characters.name: Walter White
characters.description: A chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine manufacturer after a terminal diagnosis.
